solution_line_template: If on Sunday {more_visitors_sunday} more people were present at the park than on Saturday, there were {visitors_saturday}+{more_visitors_sunday} = <<{more_visitors_sunday}+{visitors_saturday}={visitors_sunday}>>{visitors_sunday} people on Sunday.
The total number of people at the park over the two days is {visitors_sunday}+{visitors_saturday}= <<{visitors_sunday}+{visitors_saturday}={total_visitors}>>{total_visitors}
